about_the_game:
REINFORCED HEARTS STORY

An unidentified flying object falls to the earth dispersed in various parts of the ancient world, many of them contained a strange virus that came into contact with residents who approached the impact zones with naivety and curiosity, generating Patients 0 that would cause an epidemic. world in a short time that caused erratic behavior and uncontrolled violence, unleashing chaos and generating very significant changes in world society, thus initiating the Dark Ages.

20 years later, in this new altered and devastated world, the Anti-Chaos Brigade was formed, which positioned itself as the new world order that fought to rebuild the new world using new knowledge in bioengineering and technologies found in meteorites, freeing the slaves. Africans and Asians of the time, together with people from ancient Europe and Nordic countries, managed to acquire great warriors who would swear loyalty to the Brigade to fight for the cause against the various enemies, inhabitants of the world controlled by the parasitic virus that led to many types of mutants, in addition to the religious fanatics who believed that the strange object that impacted the world and caused disaster was a gift from heaven.

Some time later, due to the strength of the threats that lurked, the Reinforced Hearts operation began, which consisted of taking the best prepared warriors and subjecting them to an experimental operation to improve their skills and convert them into the special unit as enhanced humans...


    THE WARRIORS

Fight for survival and freedom under the skin of one of the protagonists of this story:

  • Sasha our Nordic warrior specializing in firearms.

  • Ulrigc our African warrior specializing in hand-to-hand combat.

  • Kimiko our Asian warrior specializing in short and long range weapons.

            

    GAMEMODES

  • PvP - Fight against other players for honor within the Anti-Chaos Brigade in various modes:

           -1vs1

           -2vs2 (Coming soon On Early Access)

           -Team Death Match (Coming soon On Early Access)

           -Tag Team Match (Coming soon On Early Access)
           -Conqueror (Coming soon On Early Access)

  • PvE - Go through the history and fight enemies to achieve your objectives as well as raw materials to craft food as well as weapons to enhance your Hero.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G / Intel i3 10300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480 4Gb / Intel UHD Graphics 620 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 / Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 / Iris Xe Graphics G7 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
